text: Angus Munro McIntosh (1 July 1884 – 1945) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1884 births Category:1945 deaths Category:People from Birkenhead Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Inverness Thistle F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Bury F.C. players Category:Aberdeen F.C. players Category:Buckie Thistle F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Angus McIntosh
